oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The part of Bushmanland formerly occupied by //kabbo. Given by /han=kasso (L VIII.-14. 7215-7217). A place called '||gubo' by the |xam is called 'Blaauwpits' by the 'Bastaards' because the rocks there are black slate. ||gubo is also ||kabbo's (Jantje Tooren's) place.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Places of the |xam
